alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:33AM CDT until June 12 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM MDT FOR NORTHERN WALLACE AND SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 1233 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Goodland to 3 miles east of Ruleton to 14 miles north of Weskan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goodland. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
